section.description: User is given the ability to run a previously staved query.

stakeholders.actor: Wants to be able to search for an Issue with great detail (including all Attribute fields) and then be able to save it for reuse at a later date.

results.result: User clicks on saved query. Result page is the Issue view or the Issue list page.

notes.note: Need to consider the ability to modify saved searches. This functionality should go into a search editor usecase.

ol.li: Scarab: filters search based on users role permissions.

if results.size( ) > 1:
Scarab: display issue list page
User: survey resulting list
User: select one of the presented issues
User: sort issues based on column heading
User: modify displayed column headings
User: enter name of search to save. Clicks save button
